SELECT r.reserve_no , c.crtroom_name , r.reserve_price , r.reserve_pay_no , r.crtroom_no , r.crt_detail_no , r.reserve_uid , r.pay_date , r.reserve_state , rc.refund_price , c.host_id FROM reserve r JOIN crtroom c ON r.crtroom_no = c.crtroom_no LEFT OUTER JOIN reserve_cancel rc ON r.reserve_no = rc.reserve_no Where r.reserve_state != 'i1' AND c.host_id = #{hostId}
AND r.pay_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{calcStartDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{calcEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
